publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8021 Sandra White: Connecting People—That the Parliament congratulates the Annex Connects Project based at the Annex Healthy Living Centre in Partick on securing a total of £275,957 from the Big Lottery Fund that will be used to help reconnect over 550 older people and carers through various therapy sessions; considers that Julie Fox, the manager of the centre, and her staff provide fantastic work for the community, and wishes them every success for the Annex Connects Project now and in the future.
S3M-8021 Connecting People (lodged on 25 February 2011) Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Anne McLaughlin*
S3M-8021 Connecting People (lodged on 25 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-8021 Connecting People (lodged on 25 February 2011) Gil Paterson*
